Package ohos.event.notification

Class NotificationActionButton.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.event.notification.NotificationActionButton.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    NotificationActionButton

    public static final class NotificationActionButton.Builder
extends Object
    Builder class for NotificationActionButton object.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Notification#ANS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Builder​(NotificationActionButton actionButton)
      A constructor used to create a Builder instance by copying parameters from an existing NotificationActionButton object.
      Builder​(PixelMap icon, String title, IntentAgent intentAgent)
      A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified icon, title, and IntentAgent for creating NotificationActionButton objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Adds additional data to this Builder.
      NotificationActionButton.Builder addNotificationUserInput​(NotificationUserInput userInput)
      Adds a NotificationUserInput object used to collect user input.
      NotificationActionButton build​()
      Uses all of the settings to create a new NotificationActionButton object.
      NotificationActionButton.Builder setAutoCreatedReplies​(boolean autoCreatedReplies)
      Sets whether to allow the platform to automatically generate possible replies and add them to NotificationUserInput#getOptions().
      NotificationActionButton.Builder setContextDependent​(boolean isContextual)
      Sets whether this NotificationActionButton is a contextual action, that is, whether this NotificationActionButton is dependent on the notification message body.
      NotificationActionButton.Builder setSemanticActionButton​(NotificationConstant.SemanticActionButton semanticActionButton)
      Sets a semantic action for this NotificationActionButton.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(PixelMap icon,
               String title,
               IntentAgent intentAgent)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance with the specified icon, title, and IntentAgent for creating NotificationActionButton objects.
        Parameters:
        icon - Indicates the icon to represent this NotificationActionButton.
        title - Indicates the title of this NotificationActionButton.
        intentAgent - Indicates the IntentAgent to be triggered when this NotificationActionButton is triggered.
        Since:
        3

      • Builder

        public Builder​(NotificationActionButton actionButton)
        A constructor used to create a Builder instance by copying parameters from an existing NotificationActionButton object.
        Parameters:
        actionButton - Indicates the existing NotificationActionButton object.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • addNotificationUserInput

        public NotificationActionButton.Builder addNotificationUserInput​(NotificationUserInput userInput)
        Adds a NotificationUserInput object used to collect user input.
        Parameters:
        userInput - Indicates the NotificationUserInput object to add.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object.
        Since:
        3

      • setContextDependent

        public NotificationActionButton.Builder setContextDependent​(boolean isContextual)
        Sets whether this NotificationActionButton is a contextual action, that is, whether this NotificationActionButton is dependent on the notification message body. For example, a contextual NotificationActionButton provides an address in the notification for users to open a map application.
        Parameters:
        isContextual - Specifies whether this NotificationActionButton is a contextual action. The value true indicates a contextual action, and the value false indicates not.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object.
        Since:
        3

      • setSemanticActionButton

        public NotificationActionButton.Builder setSemanticActionButton​(NotificationConstant.SemanticActionButton semanticActionButton)
        Sets a semantic action for this NotificationActionButton.
        Parameters:
        semanticActionButton - Indicates the semantic action to add. For available values, see NotificationConstant.SemanticActionButton.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object.
        Since:
        3

      • setAutoCreatedReplies

        public NotificationActionButton.Builder setAutoCreatedReplies​(boolean autoCreatedReplies)
        Sets whether to allow the platform to automatically generate possible replies and add them to NotificationUserInput#getOptions().
        Parameters:
        autoCreatedReplies - Specifies whether to allow the platform to automatically generate possible replies. The value true means to allow generated replies; and the value false means not.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object.
        Since:
        3

      • addAdditionalData

        public NotificationActionButton.Builder addAdditionalData​(PacMap pacMap)
        Adds additional data to this Builder.
        Parameters:
        pacMap - Indicates the PacMap object containing the additional data.
        Returns:
        Returns this Builder object.
        Since:
        3

      • build

        public NotificationActionButton build​()
        Uses all of the settings to create a new NotificationActionButton object.
        Returns:
        Returns the created NotificationActionButton object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if NotificationActionButton.isContextDependent() is true but icon or intentAgent is null.
        Since:
        3
